title: Casual Leave Policy
text: Employees are allowed up to 12 casual leave days per year. Casual leave can be used for short-term personal needs or emergencies.

title: Sick Leave Policy
text: Employees may take paid sick leave when unwell. A medical certificate is required for absences longer than two consecutive days.

title: Maternity Leave Policy
text: Female employees are entitled to 26 weeks of maternity leave as per government regulations.

title: Paternity Leave Policy
text: Male employees may take up to 15 days of paternity leave within six months of childbirth.
